context: Technology consulting firm, 500 employees, post-pandemic evaluation of hybrid work effectiveness

request.purpose: Implement flexible hybrid work policy with technology upgrades and office redesign
request.justification: Employee satisfaction scores dropped 15%, voluntary turnover increased 25% due to work-life balance concerns

decision_process.outcome: Draft policy allowing 3 days remote work with core collaboration days
Pilot successful with 10% productivity increase and improved satisfaction
Approved for phased rollout starting Q2 2026
